Text: The need and demand for affordable family housing is strong in these two communities. All units will be available to households earning less than 60% of the area median income (AMI), or $49,700 for a family of four.
Cause: The need and demand for affordable family housing is strong in these two communities.
Effect: All units will be available to households earning less than 60% of the area median income (AMI), or $49,700 for a family of four.
Sentence: <e1>The need and demand for affordable family housing is strong in these two communities.</e1> <e2>All units will be available to households earning less than 60% of the area median income (AMI), or $49,700 for a family of four.</e2>
